meta.title: Setup WebSocket infrastructure for real-time updates

task.role: You are a Senior Rust Engineer with expertise in systems programming and APIs. Implement Task 10 with production-quality code.

context.overview: Implement WebSocket endpoint for live task updates and team activity
context.background: Review PRD and architecture in .tasks/docs/ for full context.

requirements.description: 1. Add axum WebSocket support with tokio-tungstenite 2. Create websocket.rs module with connection management 3. Implement /ws endpoint with authentication via query parameter JWT 4. Create WebSocket connection pool grouped by team_id 5. Add Redis pub/sub for broadcasting updates across server instances 6. Handle WebSocket connection lifecycle (connect, disconnect, heartbeat) 7. Support 1000 concurrent connections with connection limits
